attributes.action: REINSTATE AND AMEND NATIONAL SERVICE CONSCRIPTION ACT 1947 AND 1948
attributes.additional_details:
After vetting individuals, this would provide skills and job prospects for the future, as well as providing training on discipline and respect.

This would create diversity amongst all cultures and faiths who enter into National Service Conscription within the UK.
attributes.background: National Service Conscription for all able bodied persons who reside in the UK, from the age of 18 to 30.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Bring back national service.'

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306432
